name: Arcade Saloon Fighter '94
description:
Hi! I'm Federico Moroz from Buenos Aires, Argentina. 

Arcade Saloon Fighter '94 is my first step in this gamedev world. It was made as a assignment project for Escuela Da Vinci using Construct 3.

It's a classic 2d beat'em up game, just like the ones I played as a kid in the 90's: Final Fight, Captain Commando, Cadillacs & Dinosaurs, Street of Rage, TMNT, Simpsons, X-Men, and the list goes on. 

The characters are Hazel, Almon and Pine (yes, they're nuts). My favorite game ever is Chrono Trigger (SNES, 1995). Its characters were designed by Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball, Dragon Quest) and I wanted my guys to look a bit like them. 

Feel free to comment below if you liked it or any suggestion.

Have fun!
